english.segment1: Light breaks the morning. Glaring headlights in the fog. To see how measurements and aerospace is moving up. This sudden danger is my calling I can swear. When I am ready I'll release
english.segment2: I'm so lost for words this stranger heard. That I'm gone forever. Leapt before the fall
english.segment3: In a million, in a million pieces I am breaking up. To the future, to the future where science is the circle taught. And light breaks the morning flooding headlights in the fog. With measurements and aerospace
english.segment4: I'm leaping out too far. I've never been so sure. Letting go of charts. And falling close to stars
english.segment5: In a million. In a million
